imgs.ss1Details: A visitor can see all previous reviews for a specific products without signin or login.

imgs.ss2Details: A user can see his/her all reviews in my-reviews route. In there he can update or delete his/her given review.

imgs.ss3Details: Only A user can add review on a specific product.

imgs.ss1Details: Only A user can book a specific product under categories.

imgs.ss2Details: A user can see his/her dashboard, where he/she can see his/her added products.

imgs.ss3Details: Only a seller can add product under specific specific book category.

imgs.ss1Details: A visitor can visit only home page. But a user can visit homepage and dynamic route.

imgs.ss2Details: A visitor can create an account and he/she can do singin.

imgs.ss3Details: Only A user can visist this dynamic route that is under product category.
